channel.title: RuneVenom|07Style
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ed4rfzR.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://runevenom.net/img/Click2Play.gif[/img][/center]
[center]WEBCLIENT: [url=http://www.runevenom.net]www.runevenom.net[/url][/center]
[center]Runevenom is a new 07 style server, with loads of content and a great community. We have plenty of features to keep you interested in the server. We are a economical based server which requires allot of supply and demand but there is still shops for most of your supplies.Thus meaning skill experience rates are not to high and not to low. We have a dedicated Development team that is always open to your suggestions. No suggestion will not be reviewed!
><> Why choose us? <>< Runescape can be a hassle. Slow experience slow money making. We have made it easier for you to enjoy the game and be a bit swifter with your rewards! Us as a development team don't care about donations even though it would help with server bills but we are developing this server to get a decent player base for you to enjoy. Check out our features below
[size=15pt][u]Features[/u][/size]
[size=13pt][u]Mini Games[/u][/size]
Barbarian assault Duel arena barrows Pest Control Fight Caves
[size=13pt]Bosses[/size]
God wars King Black Dragons Dagannoth Kings Kalphite Queen Gu'tanoth And many more to come
[size=13pt]Training Areas[/size] Islands Desert Snow mountain Slayer tower Edgeville Dungeon Brimhaven Dungeon Taverly Dungeon Frankenstein Dungeon
[size=13pt]Skilling[/size]
Troll random "get away from my fishies" [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/8/84/20091231200714!Agility-icon.png[/img]Agility( full agility Gnome course with falling on ocasion)[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/8/84/20091231200714!Agility-icon.png[/img]
[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/f/f7/20110305043303!Cooking-icon.png[/img]Cooking (fully 100% cooking/burning)[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/f/f7/20110305043303!Cooking-icon.png[/img]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041615/2007scape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img]Crafting ( Gems,Dragonhide,jewlery)[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041615/2007scape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img]
[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/f/f0/20091231200715!Farming-icon.png[/img]Farming (Rake - dibbler-water can-picking)[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/f/f0/20091231200715!Farming-icon.png[/img]
[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/6/6d/20110305013540!Firemaking-icon.png[/img]Firemaking (100% cliped firemaking/ashes)[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/6/6d/20110305013540!Firemaking-icon.png[/img]
[img]http://i771.photobucket.com/albums/xx354/Magic_Bolero/fishing_icon.gif[/img]Fishing ( All fish fishable)[img]http://i771.photobucket.com/albums/xx354/Magic_Bolero/fishing_icon.gif[/img]
[img]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo165/Irish_Talent/Runescape%20Icons/fletching_icon.gif[/img]Fletching (fletching all bows/stringing bows)[img]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo165/Irish_Talent/Runescape%20Icons/fletching_icon.gif[/img]
[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/f/f1/20110305011631!Herblore-icon.png[/img]Herblore (cleaning herbs/creating potions)[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/f/f1/20110305011631!Herblore-icon.png[/img]
[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/2/28/20110305004636!Mining-icon.png[/img]Mining (all rock mineable/ore disspearing)[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/2/28/20110305004636!Mining-icon.png[/img]
[img]http://iceyoften.webs.com/photos/runescape/runecrafting_icon.gif[/img]Runecrafting ( working runecrafting abyss)[img]http://iceyoften.webs.com/photos/runescape/runecrafting_icon.gif[/img]
[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/c/cf/20110305015030!Slayer-icon.png[/img]Slayer ( 100% working slayer)[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/c/cf/20110305015030!Slayer-icon.png[/img]
[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/d/df/20110305005838!Smithing-icon.png[/img]Smithing (ore to bars on furnace/all bars to anvil)[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/d/df/20110305005838!Smithing-icon.png[/img]
[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/f/f3/20091231200716!Thieving-icon.png[/img]Thieving(thieving stalls/pickpockets numerous of NPC)[img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/f/f3/20091231200716!Thieving-icon.png[/img]
[img]http://www.rune-war.net/land/images/wc.gif[/img]Woodcutting ( All trees can be cut/hatchet breaking/bird nests with rewards)[img]http://www.rune-war.net/land/images/wc.gif[/img] [/center]
[center][size=13pt]Misc[/size] Highscores (currently developing) Vote for mystery box (almost finished) Lootshare Quests VPS hosted 99% up time (updates of course) Vbullten forums (currently developing) Automatic donation(currently developing)[/center]
[center][size=20pt]MEDIA[/size][/center]
[center][youtube]http://youtu.be/0OkwBxUJtmE[/youtube][/center]
[center] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93756338/client%20background.png[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93756338/farming.png[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93756338/barab%20assault.png[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93756338/agility.png[/img][/center]
[b][i][u][size=15pt]MORE MEDIA COMING SOON[/size][/u][/i][/b]

item.title: RuneVenom|07Style
item.dc:creator: @DukeDice DukeDice
item.description:
@DukeDice wrote:

[quote=“knallekalle, post:5, topic:535957”][quote author=DukeDice link=topic=654763.msg4385285#msg4385285 date=1385181334]
You wont let me login to the server without an account and I cannot register an account as your website isn’t great… it’s just one page. I try creating an account like most rsps by choosing a name and password on the login bit, and it says my computer has been banned? Get your game sorted.
[/quote] maybe you are banned who knows

  • i like this server, i just began playing it!:)[/quote]

Nope, terrible server. I stick with what I said.

Read full topic

item.description:
@zenix-pkers wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][/center]

[center]WEBCLIENT: www.runevenom.net[/center]

[center]Runevenom is a new 07 style server, with loads of content and a great community. We have plenty of features to keep you interested in the server. We are a economical based server which requires allot of supply and demand but there is still shops for most of your supplies.Thus meaning skill experience rates are not to high and not to low. We have a dedicated Development team that is always open to your suggestions. No suggestion will not be reviewed!

<> Why choose us? <><
Runescape can be a hassle. Slow experience slow money making. We have made it easier for you to enjoy the game and be a bit swifter with your rewards! Us as a development team don’t care about donations even though it would help with server bills but we are developing this server to get a decent player base for you to enjoy. Check out our features below

[size=15pt]Features[/size]

[size=13pt]Mini Games[/size]

Barbarian assault
Duel arena
barrows
Pest Control
Fight Caves

[size=13pt]Bosses[/size]

God wars
King Black Dragons
Dagannoth Kings
Kalphite Queen
Gu’tanoth
And many more to come

[size=13pt]Training Areas[/size]
Islands
Desert
Snow mountain
Slayer tower
Edgeville Dungeon
Brimhaven Dungeon
Taverly Dungeon
Frankenstein Dungeon

[size=13pt]Skilling[/size]

Troll random "get away from my fishies"
Agility( full agility Gnome course with falling on ocasion)

Cooking (fully 100% cooking/burning)

Crafting ( Gems,Dragonhide,jewlery)

Farming (Rake - dibbler-water can-picking)

Firemaking (100% cliped firemaking/ashes)

Fishing ( All fish fishable)

Fletching (fletching all bows/stringing bows)

Herblore (cleaning herbs/creating potions)

Mining (all rock mineable/ore disspearing)

Runecrafting ( working runecrafting abyss)

Slayer ( 100% working slayer)

Smithing (ore to bars on furnace/all bars to anvil)

Thieving(thieving stalls/pickpockets numerous of NPC)

Woodcutting ( All trees can be cut/hatchet breaking/bird nests with rewards)
[/center]

[center][size=13pt]Misc[/size]
Highscores (currently developing)

99% up time (updates of course)
